lines.text: So, this is Poona. Bit of a disappointment really.

[at a football match in Cairo]
Apart from a player questioning whether it was the will of Allah that he be sent off it's exactly the same as at home.
No-one seems to have heard of Cairo. It's only the capital city for heaven's sake!
We trust you Michael, we just don't trust the BBC!

[on the train to Shanghai]
There's a small army of 50 staff on this train. I'm not quite sure what they all do but yesterday I saw one energetically sloshing a wet mop up and down our corridor. It didn't seem to be doing the carpet any good at all.
